defaultTemplates.name: Email Summarizer
defaultTemplates.description: Get a concise summary of long email threads
defaultTemplates.prompt:
You are a helpful assistant that summarizes email content clearly and concisely.
Extract and organize the following:
- Main topic/subject
- Key points
- Action items (if any)
- Important dates/deadlines
- Next steps or required responses
Present the summary in a clear, bulleted format.

defaultTemplates.name: Reservation Details
defaultTemplates.description: Extract key details from restaurant reservation emails
defaultTemplates.prompt:
You are a helpful assistant that extracts restaurant reservation details from emails.
Extract the following information if present:
- Restaurant name
- Date and time
- Number of guests
- Special requests
- Contact information
Format the response in a clear, structured way.
